infos.info: By Hickerson, Al Pearce and His Gang was AKA - Watch The Fun Go By, 1/5/37-6/28/38 - Fun Valley, 5/14/44-7/30/44 - Here Comes Elmer. 12/9/44-6/30/45

SPONSORS - Ford Motors, Grape Nuts,Dole Pineapple, Camel Cigarettes, Fun Valley, Lewis-Howe. - From 1928-32 station KFRC in San Francisco aired as The Happy-Go-Lucky Hour. - Also broadcast under the name of Al Pearce and His Gang.
